key.name: window-width
key.description: The width of the main window.

key.name: window-height
key.description: The height of the main window.

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Whether the main window is maximized.

key.name: last-vault-directory
key.description: The last directory used for opening or saving vaults.

key.name: use-reed-solomon
key.description: Adds forward error correction to vault files to protect against corruption. Increases file size based on redundancy level.

key.name: rs-redundancy-percent
key.description: Percentage of redundancy for error correction (5-50%). Higher values provide better corruption recovery but increase file size.

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: Application appearance: 'default' follows system preference, 'light' forces light mode, 'dark' forces dark mode.

key.name: backup-enabled
key.description: Create timestamped backup files when saving vaults. Provides protection against accidental data loss.

key.name: backup-count
key.description: Maximum number of timestamped backups to keep (1-50). Older backups are automatically deleted when this limit is exceeded.
